full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD MGON PO PHYAG DRUG GI SGRUB THABS 'DOD PA'I RE DGONGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MI PHYED DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD PHUL DU BYUNG BAS CHOS LA BLO MIG RGYAS DBU MDZAD CHOS JRE DON GRUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I MDO MCHOG PAR, RAB RNAMS GA-YENG GI KHOL BOR RGAL BA'I DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS SO, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, BHA WANDU,,)
